column1:
Odeinoichus,"2018-07-15T22:21:32.7Z","NINJA-TURBO!","

Set #30532 Turbo: Here’s the third Polybag from this year’s Ninjago Theme and it features Lloyd once again, this time in his Ninja outfit and riding around on a custom one-seat car.
Pros:

column2: Fun enjoyable build with a playable model that looks great.
Lloyd Minifigure in a cheap set dressed in his new season outfit.
Loaded with green and pearl gold elements.

column1: Cons:

column2: None really to speak of, unless you aren’t a fan of the new Movie designs being part of the regular non-movie based Theme.

column1: Overall opinion

Not a bad little set and the most impressive of the Polybags from Ninjago this year, the Turbo car works great, comes with four golden weapons (two sai and two katana) for Lloyd to use and is a cheap way to get the new season version for your collection. Highly recommended.
